content.description: Sit start in the pit on the undercling. Move up the prow to the sharp tooth hold. Match it and go for the jawbone rail. Two finishes left and right of the jawbone, both at the same grade.A lot easier if you skip the match and shoot right to a flake. Would be a 4 star route if you couldn't.
content.location: Farthest end of the pit in the Carpet Boulder area

content.description: start on the jug rail as low as possible and make a few moves up and right on rail then up to the big jugs and over the prow!
content.protection: pad or two and a spotter

content.description: This one starts low in a hole and climbs out of the hole to the right. Stand start, work around the corner to the right gaining height and top out on the right middle of the SW face. Felt harder then other ones here at the grade
content.location: From the parking lot walk SE, pass between the Carpet boulder on your left and Blast on your right, don't fall in the giant hole, walk around the right and hop down on the South side of the boulder

content.description: not too secluded as you kinda feel like your in the parking lot but worth checking out for sure!
